about_the_game:
PLEASE NOTE: This game is for Japanese speakers only. Please note that it does not support any other languages.

The controller is "your voice" - an action RPG that can only be controlled by a microphone

Game Overview

SUIKAWA LEAD is an action RPG that utilizes a voice recognition system.

As the "guide to another world," you can say "run" or "turn right" in front of the microphone, and the character will follow your instructions. Your "words" may sometimes be blocked by distortions in space-time and may not be conveyed properly. However, this inconvenience is also the best part of this game. You will need the skills to believe in your own voice and use the power of your words to advance your adventure in the midst of difficulties. Players will use delicate control and instantaneous judgment to overcome various challenges.

Story

"Your "words" have a special power. Awaken the "Smasher" - break the watermelon!"

Game Features

  • Operation and play using voice: Voice commands correspond to various actions. In addition to controlling the character, there are also plenty of gimmicks that can be conquered using voice, such as doors that open with specific words.

  • Challenge various dungeons: Explore dungeons with different themes and mechanisms and take on numerous challenges. Unique puzzles and battles using voice await you. For example, in the dungeon with the theme of "greetings", enemies appear that can be neutralized by saying "Thank you for your hard work!".

  • Growth elements: As you progress through the adventure, you will acquire new voice commands and your character will grow. Stats such as HP and attack power will be strengthened, allowing you to take on more difficult challenges.

Notes

  • The use of a "microphone" and "headphones" (headset) is required.

  • To improve the accuracy of voice recognition, we recommend playing in a quiet environment.

  • This game contains mild vulgar language. Please be careful if you are not comfortable with it.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 （64-bit）
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4130 or Core™ i5-3470 or AMD FX™-6100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 OR AMD RX 5500 XT (VRAM 6 GB OR HIGHER)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Connecting a PC microphone
